0.1.name: wordpress/wp-word-cloud
0.1.description:
Add a nice looking word cloud on any page or post using shortcodes and words you define yourself.

=Usage= Basic word cloud:

[wp-word-cloud] [text="HTML"] [text="CSS"] [text="jQuery"] [/wp-word-cloud]

Advanced word cloud:

[wp-word-cloud color="44DF00"] [text="HTML" weight="4"] [text="CSS" weight="2"] [text="jQuery" weight="1" link="http://www.jquery.com"] [/wp-word-cloud]
